cookieConsent: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

title: Posts

mediaRestrictions: Image upload to IPFS (jpeg, jpg, png, gif. Max file size 1.8Mb). Video upload to Livepeer (mp4 encoded H264 with aac audio. Max file size 1 Gb)
invalidFileFormat: Invalid file format. Allowed formats: jpeg, jpg, png, gif, mp4.
invalidFileSize: Invalid file size. Max allowed is 1.8mb for images and 1Gb for videos.

bountyDaysTip: Number of days while bounty is active

addForLineBreaks: for linebreak add 2 spaces at end

contentPopupBlock_1: We're glad to have you here and excited for your first post.
contentPopupBlock_2: Here are a few things to keep in mind while you're publishing:
contentPopupBlock_3: Make sure to choose the appropriate Community and Type for your post.
contentPopupBlock_4: Only make posts that will result in valuable information.
contentPopupBlock_5: Remember to check that the same post hasn’t already been published.
contentPopupBlock_6: Please, avoid spamming, self-promotion, financial advice, bullying, and discrimination.
contentPopupBlock_7: We expect all members of our community to treat each other with respect and kindness.
contentPopupBlock_8: For complete rules please read the <0>article</0> in our documentation.
moderatorsCanDeletePosts: Moderators have the right to delete posts that don't meet these requirements. This could affect your reputation.
suggestInterestingComm: Suggest a community, which will be interesting to you and 100 other users who will vote for it.

metaTransaction.agreeWithMetaTransactions: You don't have enough MATIC to cover this transaction. It's likely to be declined because of insufficient funds. However, there are other ways to send transactions.
metaTransaction.youNeedMetaBecause: Your MATIC balance is 0. MATIC is required to pay transaction fees.
metaTransaction.dontWorry: Don’t worry! We’ve got you covered.
metaTransaction.wouldYouLike: Would you like to see available options?
metaTransaction.agreeWithMetaTransactionsText: Skip approving every interaction with your wallet for 30 days and allow Peeranha sign transactions on your behalf.
metaTransaction.agreeWithMetaTransactionsSecondaryText: Signing keys can only sign messages and cannot hold funds. They are stored securely in the browser database system
